text: The @US_FDA has officially placed #hydroxychloroquine and #chloroquine on the #DrugShortage list after multiple reports patients can't fill prescriptions. Status updates are availble for #hcq here (https://t.co/C7vJExetTE) and chloroquine here (https://t.co/XhL6i9Sm5L). #COVID19 https://t.co/rVsWbSEGAi
